objects.specification: A seamless light gray floor plane with a smooth matte finish covering the entire classroom area; the surface features a subtle texture to prevent glare and ensure safe traction underfoot.
Clean white upright walls with smooth surfaces painted in a slight satin sheen to enhance brightness; minimalistic design without decorative moldings for a modern classroom feel.
Clean white upright walls with smooth surfaces painted in a slight satin sheen to enhance brightness; minimalistic design without decorative moldings for a modern classroom feel.
Clean white upright walls with smooth surfaces painted in a slight satin sheen to enhance brightness; minimalistic design without decorative moldings for a modern classroom feel.
Clean white upright walls with smooth surfaces painted in a slight satin sheen to enhance brightness; minimalistic design without decorative moldings for a modern classroom feel.

A rectangular teacher’s desk in rich dark wood tone with a smooth polished surface and sturdy straight legs; includes a modesty panel for a professional appearance and ample workspace for teaching materials.
An ergonomic teacher’s office chair upholstered in a complementary neutral tone, featuring a padded seat and backrest, curved armrests, and a stable five-leg base for height adjustment and comfort.
A large rectangular blackboard with a deep matte black writing surface and slim dark metallic edging; designed to provide clear chalk contrast with minimal glare under classroom lighting.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector in a light-colored casing with streamlined vents and rounded edges; engineered to project crisp images onto the front wall with precise lens alignment.

A tall rectangular bookshelf in medium wood tone featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves and an open-back design; shelves are stocked with simulated books of varying heights for a realistic library feel.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and a slender trunk, set in a simple glazed ceramic pot; adds a natural accent and vertical interest to the corner.
A circular wall clock with a clean white face, bold black hour marks, and a slim metallic frame; features simple hour and minute hands for clear time visibility in a modern design.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes set in a thin white frame; designed to admit abundant natural light and enhance the bright interior aesthetic.
A pair of full-height lightweight curtains in a soft neutral hue, featuring gentle folds and mounted on a ceiling rail; diffuses incoming light while framing the window elegantly.
A small cylindrical waste bin in matte gray plastic with a flared top and stable base; functional design for discreet and convenient trash disposal.
A small cylindrical waste bin in matte gray plastic with a flared top and stable base; functional design for discreet and convenient trash disposal.
A low-profile square ceiling light fixture with a translucent diffuser and white housing; designed to evenly distribute bright lumens for uniform classroom illumination.
A low-profile square ceiling light fixture with a translucent diffuser and white housing; designed to evenly distribute bright lumens for uniform classroom illumination.

An educational poster with colorful illustrative graphics and bold text printed on semi-gloss paper; mounted flat against the wall to reinforce learning themes.

An individual student desk crafted from light wood tone with a flat rectangular top, slender square-tubing legs, and a modesty panel; provides ample surface for books and laptops.
A compact student chair featuring a matching wood-tone seat and backrest on a sturdy metal frame, contoured for comfort with a stable four-leg base.
